CustomField.description: This is the value it must match to, to choose this template. Note, this could be a semi colon separated list, so if more than one answer should follow the same track, you do not need to create multiple different AWT.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the value it must match to, to choose this template. Note, this could be a semi colon separated list, so if more than one answer should follow the same track, you do not need to create multiple different AWT.
CustomField.label: Answer
